zh: 你决定好我们在哪里吃午饭了吗？

en: Even though it's cheap, why are you buying so much toilet paper? We don't have anywhere to put it all.
zh: 即使它很便宜，你为什么要买这么多卫生纸？我们没有地方放了。

en: My upper-right molar has been throbbing since yesterday.
zh: 我右上方的臼齿从昨天开始就一直在抽痛。

en: Look! There's a cockroach besides the fridge! Do something quick!
zh: 看！冰箱旁边有一只蟑螂！快做点什么！

en: When he whispered something into her ear, she moved just as he said, as if she had been hypnotized.
zh: 当他在她耳边说了些什么时，她就像被催眠了一样，按照他说的做了。

en: Eat your soup before it gets cold.
zh: 趁热喝汤。

en: Please eat it while it's still hot.
zh: 请趁热吃。

en: Whenever I go to this store, they're selling freshly baked taiyaki cakes.
zh: 每次我去这家店，他们都在卖新鲜出炉的鲷鱼烧。

en: He's sitting between the two chairs.
zh: 他坐在两把椅子之间。

en: Suffice to say, Edna gets no work done.
zh: 总而言之，埃德娜什么都没做。

en: A baseball came rolling to my feet.
zh: 一个棒球滚到了我的脚边。

en: Have you already eaten supper?
zh: 你已经吃过晚饭了吗？

en: Have you eaten supper yet?
zh: 你吃过晚饭了吗？

en: Dinosaurs became extinct a very long time ago.
zh: 恐龙在很久以前就灭绝了。

en: Dinosaurs died out a very long time ago.
zh: 恐龙在很久以前就灭绝了。

en: I'm Chinese.
zh: 我是中国人。

en: Tom doesn't love me.
zh: 汤姆不爱我。

en: Call Ishmael.
zh: 给以实玛利打电话。

en: This house is not very big.
zh: 这房子不是很大。

en: That's where the heart of the case is.
zh: 这就是案件的核心所在。

en: We almost froze to death.
zh: 我们差点冻死了。

en: We came dangerously close to freezing to death.
zh: 我们差点冻死了。

en: He came back at six.
zh: 他六点回来了。

en: He got back at six.
zh: 他六点回来了。

en: Once upon a time, there was a cat whose name was Tango.
zh: 很久很久以前，有一只猫，它的名字叫探戈。

en: I came here to see if there was something I could do to help, but there doesn't seem to be anything for me to do.
zh: 我来这里看看有没有什么能帮上忙的，但似乎没有什么我能做的。

en: Ishmael, come over here!
zh: 以实玛利，过来这里！

en: Beaches in Hawaii are famous for their large waves.
zh: 夏威夷的海滩以其大浪而闻名。

en: Drunk driving is a serious problem.
zh: 酒后驾车是一个严重的问题。

en: Sea turtles have a long lifespan.
zh: 海龟的寿命很长。

en: Please don't let the children play with knives.
zh: 请不要让孩子们玩刀。

en: Please don't allow the children to play with knives.
zh: 请不要让孩子们玩刀。

en: Many people in England would like to see the public subsidy of the monarchy abolished.
zh: 许多英国人希望看到废除对君主制的公共补贴。

en: I easily found his office.
zh: 我很容易就找到了他的办公室。

en: I had no trouble finding his office.
zh: 我毫不费力地找到了他的办公室。

en: Would you lend me a pencil?
zh: 你能借我一支铅笔吗？

en: Could I borrow a pencil?
zh: 我可以借一支铅笔吗？

en: Tom has money. However, he's not all that happy.
zh: 汤姆有钱。然而，他并不是很开心。

en: We should always obey laws.
zh: 我们应该永远遵守法律。

en: May I put it here?
zh: 我可以放在这儿吗？

en: I don't mind if it's a little cold.
zh: 我不太介意有点凉。

en: I don't care if it's a bit cold.
zh: 我不在乎有点冷。

en: Stop fooling around and help me!
zh: 别闹了，帮我一下！

en: I wouldn't be too surprised if this song became a hit.
zh: 如果这首歌走红，我不会太惊讶。

en: I don't mind if it's hot.
zh: 我不介意热。

en: I don't mind if the weather is hot.
zh: 我不介意天气热。

en: I made this gratin using yesterday's leftovers. It tastes pretty good, doesn't it?
zh: 我用昨天的剩菜做了这个焗烤。味道还不错，对吧？

en: Have you ever eaten chocolate-covered popcorn?
zh: 你吃过巧克力爆米花吗？

en: The meaning of this letter is unclear.
zh: 这封信的意思不明确。

en: Surely, in the present-day society, we might as well consider it natural that consumption plays an important role in the life of man and is closely related to his well-being and happiness.
zh: 当然，在当今社会，我们不妨认为消费在人类生活中扮演着重要的角色，并且与他的福祉和幸福息息相关，这是很自然的。

en: I don't mind if it's hot and spicy.
zh: 我不介意又热又辣。

en: “Tom!” “Mary!”
zh: “汤姆！”“玛丽！”

en: Gin is not my friend.
zh: 我不喜欢金酒。

en: It rained gently the whole day.
zh: 整天下着毛毛细雨。

en: Bye, Sayoko!
zh: 再见，纱代子！

en: Good-bye, Sayoko!
zh: 再见，纱代子！

en: Good day! You are our new neighbor, if I am not mistaken?
zh: 你好！如果你没搞错的话，你是我们的新邻居吧？

en: I will call my grandmother to see whether or not she needs anything.
zh: 我会打电话给奶奶，看看她是否需要什么。

en: I killed two birds with one stone.
zh: 我一石二鸟。

en: I crossed the street.
zh: 我穿过了马路。

en: This makes me curious.
zh: 这让我很好奇。

en: A is enough, but B is not enough.
zh: A足够了，但是B不够。

en: Excuse me, is this seat free?
zh: 请问，这个座位有人吗？

en: Is there a pharmacy nearby?
zh: 附近有药房吗？

en: If it looks like an apple and it tastes like an apple, it's probably an apple.
zh: 如果它看起来像苹果，尝起来也像苹果，那它可能就是苹果。

en: Tom was sitting on a bench eating something that looked like an apple.
zh: 汤姆正坐在长凳上吃着一个看起来像苹果的东西。

en: The pears we eat in Japan look almost like apples.
zh: 我们在日本吃的梨子看起来几乎像苹果。

en: John is indifferent about his clothes.
zh: 约翰对他的衣服漠不关心。

en: What in the world do you think you're doing?
zh: 你到底在干什么？

en: What on earth do you think you're doing?
zh: 你到底在干什么？

en: I want to go to Hawaii next spring.
zh: 我明年春天想去夏威夷。

en: To tell the truth, sweetheart, I'm not at all interested.
zh: 说实话，亲爱的，我一点都不感兴趣。

en: She is teaching us French.
zh: 她正在教我们法语。

en: He has a headache.
zh: 他头疼。

en: Maybe he's jogging around the park.
zh: 也许他正在公园里慢跑。

en: Can you speak Chinese?
zh: 你会说中文吗？

en: She dumped me.
zh: 她甩了我。

en: I am truly sorry.
zh: 我真的非常抱歉。

en: She has absolutely no enemies.
zh: 她绝对没有敌人。

en: He could recite the poem at age 5.
zh: 他5岁的时候就能背诵这首诗了。

en: Bears can climb trees.
zh: 熊会爬树。

en: Four people were in the car when the accident happened.
zh: 事故发生时，车里有四个人。

en: It would be good if you could sing.
zh: 如果你能唱歌就好了。

en: After the wind has stopped, let's sail the boat off to the open sea.
zh: 风停了以后，我们把船驶向大海吧。

en: I am holding a glass bottle with a letter inserted.
zh: 我拿着一个玻璃瓶，里面塞着一封信。

en: That horror movie was very scary and I couldn't sleep after watching it.
zh: 那部恐怖电影非常可怕，看完后我睡不着觉。

en: Finally, I found a job.
zh: 我终于找到工作了。

en: He is antisocial.
zh: 他很孤僻。

en: I think that it's possible.
zh: 我认为这是有可能的。

en: Everything will be fine.
zh: 一切都会好起来的。

en: Let's start translating!
zh: 我们开始翻译吧！

en: I was able to swim faster when I was younger.
zh: 我年轻的时候游得更快。

en: Look at the train crossing the bridge.
zh: 看那辆火车正在过桥。

en: I'll be back at six-thirty.
zh: 我六点半回来。

en: I'll be back at half past six.
zh: 我六点半回来。

en: I'll be back at half six.
zh: 我六点半回来。

en: I'll be back at 6:30.
zh: 我六点半回来。

en: I come back home at 6:30.
zh: 我六点半回家。

en: I ran into your brother on the street.
zh: 我在街上碰到了你哥哥。

en: By chance, I met your brother on the street.
zh: 我在街上偶然遇到了你哥哥。

en: I can't drink milk.
zh: 我不能喝牛奶。

en: Do you have a boyfriend or a girlfriend? Where did you meet them?
zh: 你有男朋友或女朋友吗？你们在哪里认识的？

en: She's made up her mind to quit the company.
zh: 她已经下定决心辞职了。

en: I'm a realistic person.
zh: 我是个现实主义者。

en: I was born in Russia.
zh: 我出生在俄罗斯。

en: I'll be back at six.
zh: 我六点回来。

en: Although I don't remember how, I've been getting some bruises on my legs lately. What should I do if it's some kind of weird disease?
zh: 虽然我不记得怎么回事，但我最近腿上总是出现一些瘀伤。如果是什么奇怪的疾病，我该怎么办？

en: I am a teacher, not a student.
zh: 我是老师，不是学生。

en: My eyes hurt!
zh: 我的眼睛疼！

en: Cocoa can be very bitter.
zh: 可可可能很苦。

en: She looks young, but actually she's older than you are.
zh: 她看起来很年轻，但实际上她比你大。

en: She is my best friend.
zh: 她是我最好的朋友。

en: Mariko went to the aesthetic salon.
zh: 真理子去了美容院。

en: Is there central heating in this building?
zh: 这栋楼里有中央供暖吗？
